results.content: First her pronunciation is difficult to understand when she speak quickly. Second, the example she is using is difficult to follow since it is in another language. Last, for a true beginner, she using terms that are not familiar and therefore it is difficult to follow. Poor!

response.content:
Thank you for taking the time to make an elaborate review. 
Actually, there is a section for definitions where you can know what each term means. For the pronunciation, it depends a great deal on your accent and what your brain is used to. Same applies for processing information. 
The language is a matter of content and it doesn't add to the setting, because I could have used Latin and it still would be the same for learning. 
Still, improvement and perfection can always be reached.

results.content:
Hi All,

Safaa gives us a brief run through of all the things you would need to start your own website so for the uninitiated in the web hosting world this is a good foundation.

On completion of the course she responded to me instantly hence the review - not just for the plain speaking but also for the information passing freely.

If you are a newbie to web hosting, or website building, then this course will certainly help you get your foot on the first rung of the ladder.

And, hey, it's free - so it's a winning combination for your first udemy, or knowledge gathering, course.

Well done - now on to your next course which will be more in-depth.

All the best,

Richard Jones
